website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice thanks to the ample components, excellent customer support, and reasonably easy assembly.
pros: Complete package that includes seat and braking system
Sturdy weight limit and 95 feet of zip line mean hours of fun for kids and adults
Not too difficult to set up
cons: Occasional quality control issues upon delivery, but customer service is helpful

customer_reviews.title: Coolest house in the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.text: Took me about 2.5 hours to set up, but I had to trim trees, etc. Straight forward design and set-up. It would be tough to install without someone(s) helping you get the slack out of the line, but that is to be expected. Trying to figure out how I can install a second one. Our house is the envy of the neighborhood. The first day, our kids (plus half the neighborhood) road it for about 5 hours straight, even in the rain. My kids run out and ride it in their PJ's first thing in the morning. You can make it as "exciting" or "ordinary" as you want based on height form the ground, angle, etc.
customer_reviews.author: pb

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product, Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I bought this for me and my adult friends. That said my kids all love it! The weight limit says 250lbs on Amazon and that's what the product says upon receipt. I had to return other zipline kits because of conflicting weight limits. This is a solid setup - well built, easy to install, and importantly safe with the included brake kit. In addition, customer service was great in terms of customization of the product. My cable was 15 to 20 ft shorter than I needed between 2 trees. They shipped me a longer cable to meet my needs. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Zipline and VERY pleased with my purchase. All the items were in the box along with easy to understand instructions. As soon as the product was delivered, I received an email from the Seller detailing additional installations instructions and safety related information. As it turns out, should have bought a longer cable because I came up 5 feet short. I contacted the Seller via email and they were very responsive and helped me with an additional loop cable that solved my problem. Great customer service ad a good product. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D HArtley

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This zip line is awesome. Our kids love it, as do we and the rest of the neighborhood. Customer service is amazing. They sent me a second trolley since we added a switchback to our zip line “course”. Shipping was fast for the original shipment and the extra trolley. Big fan of this product!
customer_reviews.author: TECO

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: My trees were 100 ft apart, so I bought more 1/4 inch cable and made another sling around the tree. I now could tighten a clamp on the 95 ft cable, and use a EZ winch to pull the cable tight up to the sling. I definitely recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L.

customer_reviews.title: Needs a cable puller!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, simple zip line for the backyard. But... beware! You must have a come-along/cable puller to properly tighten the line! The “broom” fix is a joke. You simply cannot sufficiently tighten this thing without mechanical help! It is sturdy enough to hold children and small adults, but installation takes a while. And, Although it does not mention it in the instructions, you should protect the tree around which you connect the cables so as to not damage the tree. A rubber hose or other tube will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Seller gladly and quickly replaced cracked seat
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly, looked well made, but seat broke with the first few times of use. Seller was very nice and immediately replaced seat at no cost to me
customer_reviews.author: Beckie McLarty

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed this on Christmas Eve in the dark by himself (1-2 hours). We did considerable research ahead of time so he could maximize the time actually spent Installing it. He has been in the construction industry all of his adult life so this kind of thing isn’t new to him. It is sturdy for our kids (9, 7, 5). My husband rode it as well (215-ish lbs). We did build a platform with a ladder for the kids to climb up to get in the seat. Def go with the longest one you have space for. The spring stop works great. They love it! Great Toy!
customer_reviews.author: SKL

customer_reviews.title: family loves it
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to put up and works great. I have no problem getting the kids to play outside since putting this up. I'm just not a huge fan of the breaking system here which is why I went with 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MariaT

customer_reviews.title: Seller was fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Christmas present for my grandchildren!!! They absolutely love it. My husband even built a platform. Had to contact seller, someone used it without permission and damaged the seat. They were so extremely helpful. Responded quickly to every email and gave me a couple of options that were all in my favor. Replaced the seat and everyone is happy. I would definitely purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This "toy" has been a hit with the kids. They lose interest in most toys within an hour or so but so far this has been a hit. They have been playing with it a little while everyday. The set-up is sturdier than I expected and the brake system works well. I used a "come-along" and a chain to set it up. I don't believe it could be set up with just a couple of guys pulling it tight. Maybe a vehicle and strap could be substituted to remove the slack while the clamps are tightened. I have a 60 pounder and an 80 pounder riding this almost daily. Everything is holding up fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Z

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This zip line is super fun for the kids. It took about a hour to set up. The only thing was the cable they gave to wrap around the tree at the top of the zip line was to small and would not fit all the way around the upper tree, so we used a chain to wrap the top tree. We also put it on a steeper hill than probably recommended, so we added 3' piece of 1" pvc between the bottom tree and the spring for a little more cushion. My kids (7-12), were on it for 2 hours straight today. Highly recommended if you have the trees that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this 1 star mainly because of an issue with the breaking system. The break block was cut through by the bungy cord and it was only needing to stop 70lbs. The manufacture has sent me a new breaking system. A spring system instead of the bungy break. I will install it and try it out this weekend and update once I get it tested for a while. I wouldn’t buy it if it comes with the bungy break but they have let me know they are going to start supplying spring breaks with the system instead
customer_reviews.author: glenn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install but could use a 2nd bungee cord.
customer_reviews.text: The zip line would be perfect if it had a 2nd bungee cord to even out the braking. I bought one separately and tied it off on the braking block and it worked well. My braking block now has an uneven groove worn into it from the brake pulling to one side. Overall the kids love it and have a blast. It was pretty easy to install except I needed an extra set of hand to properly tension the zip line.
customer_reviews.author: dsimba

customer_reviews.title: This kit is NOT completely safe
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feelings on this kit because many kids had a lot of fun using it but one nearly severed the tip of a finger when she somehow got it wedged in between a wheel of the trolley and the strand while riding it. I don't know how it happened but it did. So please make sure users keep their hands on the handles. Or better yet, get a better trolley which keeps the hands far away from the moving parts.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schreiner

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter [and her friends] are having a lot of fun with this in our yard. Finally got something fun going on back there! Complete kit, only items needed outside of what's included is some tree protection. For our landing side I've been adjusting the padding to prevent tree damage after install, the wire rope will quickly cut into the tree without some proper protection. Using an 11' heavy duty chain on the start side to wrap the 3' diameter tree trunk. The chain is fine and safe on the tree without any protection.
customer_reviews.author: Formula|Brand

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary Backyard Fun
customer_reviews.text: I assembled and installed this CTSC 95 Ft. Zip Line Kit without help but required a hand getting the line taut between trees. The instructions provided are adequate with one exception regarding tree diameter, or circumference. Maximum tree dimensions are not mentioned and a larger tree may require a supplemental sling cable. The tree I chose at one end required a longer cable which I had on hand (a lengthy tow cable that did the job). The installation resulted in an exceptionally fun and exciting time for adults and children alike.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Oterson

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it's connected to 2 trees
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I installed it with the help of my wife. I had the launch end connected to a large silver maple and the other end connected to a 4x4x8 treated in 2 ft of concrete. Our span was about 65 ft. My 7 year old (65lbs) took the first ride and the concrete the 4x4 was in split. I moved the end to a small but sturdy cedar tree and then we had a fun couple of hours. Kids up to 90 lbs in our neighborhood were on it all night. This zip line is great but make sure you're anchored to 2 trees.
customer_reviews.author: Cag

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Giving 4 stars due to the turnbuckle not being large enough to accommodate the ends of the sling cable properly. I ordered a larger one and the Zip line is perfect now. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Part broke after 10 Zips - See picture.
customer_reviews.text: We have a huge wooded area behind our house and it's perfect for a zipline. So, after reading lots of reviews we went with this product because of it's high ratings. We ordered it and it arrived yesterday. My wife spent 2 hours today installing and tweaking it to make sure it was OK. Kids got home from school and started ziplining! After about 10 zips the fun was over. The turnbuckle buckled and broke. I sent the company an e-mail with the details, but in the meantime the whole thing had to come down to make sure no one got hurt. I will update if/when the company replies.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mello

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, all the kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, all the kids love it! When I asked about a nut that I lost during installation, seller immediately sent a replacement u-clamp. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great kit. The kids love it. At every birthday party I have to ride the little kids on my lap for over 30 minutes straight because it's the hit of the backyard. Initial purchase, the seller custom made the cable for 115' without any problems and no extra charge. They also sent a replacement part 2 years after purchase in honor of their 10 year warranty. I highly recommend buying this kit.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Zip line is reallly well made!
customer_reviews.text: The Zip Line is a huge favorite in our backyard. We have swings and other "toys", but this Zip Line is clearly a favorite for out kids and their friends. It is very safe and the kids can ride it on their own. The product quality is very good. We have had this for two years and it has had 1000's of uses and is still in great shape. Would highly recommend. The Company is also excellent. If you have any questions they respond in just a few hours. Glad we made the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Up in minutes and a full day of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This zipline is perfect for the kids and easy as ever to install. Use the full length of the line if you can as it will hold very well between two trees that use the entire cable. Make sure to have the receiving tree with the shock absorber high enough to allow for the kids to stay aloft. This was a great hit and we have used it over 3 different family outings. Built to last and quality throughout. You will not be disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wojnowski

customer_reviews.title: Best zip line ever
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together in 30 minutes. My 4 kids ages 14, 9, 7 and 4 are all obsessed with it. Our backyard is a hit with all their friends. And product was packaged beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Patierno

customer_reviews.title: Amazon product with great customer service from CTSC
customer_reviews.text: We bought this zipline about 2 months ago. It was shipped very fast and was very easy to install. Although our trees were exactly 95' apart, the cable was long enough and has good margins. Seller is particularly awesome! There was a minor defect and when I contacted seller, they shipped replacement parts very quickly. I did not have to involve amazon. Seller (John) is amazing and with customer service even better than Amazon! I will highly recommend this zipline and especially the seller!
customer_reviews.author: N Verma

customer_reviews.title: Solid coronavirus home entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 and a 4 year old. Hung this across my front yard, probably took 90 minutes, most of which consisted of me yelling at my family while I was trying to get the slack out of the line. At about a 4% grade, kids love it, it’s definitely a bit slower though. Bought some reinforced PVC to put the line through in hopes of helping the trees out.
customer_reviews.author: KSR

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap hardware.
customer_reviews.text: The cable and pulley system seems to be good quality, but the included hardware is super cheap. Several of the cable clamps were bent and were already cross threaded when I took them out of the package. The bolts that were included to hold the turnbuckle also stripped out. Kind of disappointing that they included such cheap hardware when it comes to kids safety. Could have been a 5 star rating if thay would have spent an extra $5-10 on the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Fistler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money. Poor quality. Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Line was very difficult to install. Thin, not good quality, slacked considerably after a 140lb woman ride it 4 times. No way it would hold 200+ lbs. adjuster snapped after 4 uses. Dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a Christmas present for our boys and they absolutely love it. My dad and husband set it up together, it takes two strong adults to get the cable tight enough. It is excellent quality. I definitely recommend getting the 100 ft, it’s the perfect length for a backyard zip line. We built a platform since one side needs to be higher up ok the tree unless you are going down hill.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Fun zipline - stood behind their warranty
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this last April 2018. It was easy to install, and appears to be made of good materials. The kids love it. Except the plastic brake block. That wore through fairly quickly during the first season of use. However, we contacted the seller almost a year after purchase, and they sent us a new and better spring brake right away - no hassle, no charges. Just great customer service. Would definitely recommend this product and this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Jeep Owner

customer_reviews.title: Good zipline- better have a fence tool for setup
customer_reviews.text: Good zipline for the yard. Held up for a party with 40 plus kids. The install can be tricky because the weight/ length of the cable. The tensioner is junk and only tightens about 8"s of cable, which is not enough to get tight. Luckily I have a barb wire fence puller that got the cable nice and tight. (at tractor supply for around $30)
customer_reviews.author: Boodaroo

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Well, the review asks the rate for "easy to install". I guess none of the ziplines can get 5 stars. This set has all the accessories needed, so I think the seller has done their best. I searched the youtube and purchased a Ratchet Tie Down from Homedepot. This saved me a lot of effort, and the zipline was installed very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha C

customer_reviews.title: Great product! UNBELIEVABLE Customer Service!!!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing company!! Not only do the parts all seem to be high quality with easy instructions for installation, but like MANY other reviewers have said,,, the customer service is what sets them APART! My 95 ft cable was just a *couple* feet too short to make an awesome run between two of our trees; as several others have reported, a quick email to the company resulted in an immediate response, and a new, 105 ft cable, shipped to our doorstep! All FREE of charge. Top Notch, all the way. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids! Fairly easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: Good kit for the back yard. Set it up as directions suggested, and we used the entire length of cable. Works great! We did end up raising the upper line attachment about one foot higher after a while, as the kids were not quite getting to the end of the cable at first. We are in Florida and have a lot of rain and humidity, and have noticed the cable is starting to show some rust after about 6 months, but everything else is still holding up well, and the cable still appears to have a lot of time before it will need replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Jim I.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: the package comes with sturdy materials and clear instructions. I recommend 2 adults for setup to help hold some of the line's eight while another adult adjusts the line while on a ladder. If attempting to do this solo, it's easier if you use tensioning tools. The seller was very responsive and helpful with a question I had.
customer_reviews.author: David Nable

customer_reviews.title: Fun in a Zip!
customer_reviews.text: What better yard activity could there be but a Zip-Line?! I had the line set up in about an hour, pretty simple, just follow the well written instruction booklet. Your tree cannot be much larger than 24" around at the starting point though, the origination line will not be long enough, I used a thick branch (At least 16"). Every thing feels like quality material and sturdy. My kids love it, and I find it a lot of fun too!
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Fun times
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit of time for the setup but all in all pretty easy. My run was a little bit shorter than the line so no issues there. Kids and adults had a good time. Our drop might be a bit more (can’t be much) than recommend as the “brake” at the end is kinda weak. Overall we have really enjoyed it during this COVID ordeal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This zip line is a quality product. The parts are sturdy and the installation instructions are good. In addition, their customer service is excellent. When I needed a piece of cable to accommodate a larger tree, they had it to me within a few days at no charge. You need to know that tightening up 95 feet of cable is best done with a cable pull unless you have a team of strong individuals helping you install it. I would definitely buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: SJ Kevin

customer_reviews.title: “This is best Christmas present ever!!”
customer_reviews.text: y’all! If you need a solid Christmas gift for your kids (mine are 6 years-10) this is it! They have played on it for a solid week! We have gotten our monies worth of it that’s for sure! The only thing I have to say is you must have someone who can put it together! Not a one persons job!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Berger

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday present for my daughter. Kids had fun for half a day before the bearings in the trolley broke! Update: they are sending me a new trolley. Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Kolesar

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids begged us for a biplane when we moved to a new house. I landed on this one because the reviews were good. My husband a friend installed it pretty quickly. We had issues with the brake (older model and it looks like they have modified things now) but the company was SUPER responsive and everything is great once again! I recommend this zip line and company and will buy from them again when a need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This requires some planning, two adults and a teenage to put up, but it was worth it. We were missing a piece, but the company was easy to reach and friendly - sending the replacement out super quickly. The design is clever, and the kids are having so much fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: CandleJules

customer_reviews.title: Great zip line if you have trees in the right places!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put up, my only complaint would be that you do need a sturdy tree that isn’t too big in diameter or the cable on the starting side will not fit around it. Otherwise we found a perfect couple of trees and we put it through it’s paces on the first day with about 30 kids, and I even used it without issue at 265lbs.
customer_reviews.author: ChristopherLOwens

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Set this up for our 7 and 8 year olds and they love it! The brake works very good. I used a come along to get the tension where needed. We set the line between a huge maple and a post I set following a guide online. I didn’t go with the full 8 degree slope since I wanted to see how the kids handled it first but I expect that I will next season. As another reviewer pointed out, the seat will spring up while trying to get off so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assemble product and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was extremely responsive on email and were able to provide a customized length to my Zip line cable as the 110 foot cable I initially ordered was slightly too short. The product shipped easily to New York. It was easy to install with one person helping although the zipline is heavy at 110 feet and needs a bit of effort to get the necessary tension on it. The Zipline is providing a lot of entertainment for the kids and a very good purchase in these times of Covid lockdowns as we want to stay away from public play areas.
customer_reviews.author: GNW

customer_reviews.title: Much better products for same price.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cheap product. The trolley pulley's stopped working after about 10 times. Now they won't even spin at all. The turnbuckle is cheap and it was missing the bag for the brake. Do yourself and favor and order a better made product!
customer_reviews.author: MsVSalt

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect birthday present! We used 88ft of ours! Great quality, took a weekend to set up with the help of some friends for the tightening part! Love how you can use the handle or seat!
customer_reviews.author: Maddi C

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Santa Clause brought this zip line for our children this past Christmas. It was fairly easy to install (would have been a breeze if we didn’t have to build a platform - we don’t have a hill. 😄). After a few months of excessive use the brake began to wear out. I contacted the customer service department and they were so amazing! Quick to respond and promptly replaced the brake for me. My kiddos are Looking forward to more zip line rides! Thanks for a great product and excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The zip line made a great Christmas present for our four year old
customer_reviews.text: The zip line made a great Christmas present for our four year old! My husband was able to set it up easily. I was worried about safety but it seems fairly safe as it i's set up fairly low to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and value
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. We did a lot of research prior to setting and we are very glad we went with this product! We have 5 kids, ages 8 to 13 - they all love this zipline! Customer service is top notch! Very quick responses and super helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Amber B.

customer_reviews.title: Short brake
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 100ft line. It took a good amount of time to install, and then we had to reinstall it as the recommenced degrees of drop was just too great. I think that had something to do with the length of the brake at the end of the line. It is quite short for the line. The kids (aged 9 and 10) need to really focus on keeping their legs back to avoid hitting the tree the end of the line is attached to. Overall, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good product. relatively easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. relatively easy to set up. Could use better instructions when setting up on a incline, Came as described. Have extra muscle available the cord gets heavy and can be had to tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A

customer_reviews.title: Great set, great service
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic set. The hardware is heavy duty and the customer service is fantastic. As soon as the package shipped, the seller sent an email with instructions and tips for safe use and installation. Once the set arrived, we decided to set up in a different location and realized we were several feet too short. I contacted the seller to see if they made longer cables. They responded immediately and offered to cut whatever length I needed. I would definitely buy their products again!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Kids and adults love it! We did upgrade to the tensioner kit and that saved lots of time and arguments. I strongly suggest the tensioner kit. Otherwise, kids love it and are having a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Tina M

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this project almost a year ago and only just got around to install it, only to realize my 'starting point' tree was too wide for the 8ft sling cable (part that goes around the 'starting point' tree). Contacted the supplier and within a day they came back promising me to provide a longer sling cable free of charge. Excellent responsiveness and customer service. Product itself is looks solid and should be relatively straightforward to install for most customers.
customer_reviews.author: RdT

customer_reviews.title: Loads of safe fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for our grand kids! The parents liked it too. Easy to construct. Very good instructions. We lost one of the parts moving it to another location and the seller was great about getting getting a replacement. Make sure an adult tests the ride to make sure the brake is properly installed!
customer_reviews.author: Radio Tech

customer_reviews.title: Huge Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit with the whole family. Fairly straight forward set-up. Lots of fun for everyone! Biggest plus: Seller communication and responsiveness! We had a glitch with cable and the seller immediately responded and remedied the issue. Very pleased. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but, READ INSTRUCTIONS FIRST. Solid construction. Took about 2/12 hours to install. A come along or method of putting initial tension on cable will help ensure proper final tension.This is a two person installation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: I like the kit, especially the hand bar. It went up fairly easy. Everything was in the kit that was in the description. Received it on time. Three of the metal clamps that were provided seem to big for the 3/16 inch cable. I’m also not sure that the cable is strong enough for an adult as it really sags when someone over 150lbs gets on it. Even though we used a come along to tighten it. My 5 year olds however love it and it doesn’t seem to sag much when they are on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backyard addition
customer_reviews.text: This kit makes it easy for someone like me that didn't know where to begin with installing a zipline. The installation was easy and my boys love it. I contacted customer service with a question and they were fast and professional with their response, and really went out of their way to make sure I was happy with the product. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good service
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue at first but the seller resolved it. Responsive customer service and good sturdy product. Grandsons are having a great time. I tested it first and at 205 lbs there was no issue at all. Adults and kids having fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Like others said a zip line is not easy to install without added equip like a come along and wire gripper. We managed with a ratchet strap. Works great, as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: All inclusive kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit with everything needed to set up a fun zip line! The seller was good about communication and helping us with questions and different sized parts. We’d recommend this kit - it was easier and cheaper to buy it like this than separately.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for our family
customer_reviews.text: My fiancee set this up in the backyard and it has been a riot for the kids (and adults!!) ever since. Our four kids (age range 7-13) enjoy it. We have large, mature trees in the backyard, so it was just a matter of figuring out hour to set it up between them. Probably not the best if you've got a small yard w/o trees. .. <3
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, easy to assemble. Overall took about an hour an mostly dis it myself with a brief bit of help (less than 10 mins) from 2 helpers. Kids love it
customer_reviews.author: jobe hittinger

customer_reviews.title: great zipline
customer_reviews.text: So fun and amazing. Our kids love it and their friends want to just play on it the entire time they are over! strong and sturdy. Takes a bit to install but I like that all the extras make it safe.
customer_reviews.author: Casey J Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun for the kids (and a few brave grownups). The directions were clear and easy to follow. I'm moderately handy and had no trouble. I nailed wood blocks on the trees so the cable wouldn't cut into the trunks. About 6 months after installation we had a large limb fall on the cable and snap it. The seller arranged for a replacement with no hassle and great service. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: Great package that includes everything you need. The product is sturdy and will provide great enjoyment for young and old alike. The customer service is as good as the product (and couldn’t have been better). They went WELL out of their way to accommodate me and I couldn’t recommend them more highly.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Buy a cable tensioner to ease installation
customer_reviews.text: This is legitimately the coolest kids toy ever. Be sure to buy a tensioner as they don’t come included, otherwise set up is easy and there are hours and hours of fun ahead!
customer_reviews.author: Young Atlas

customer_reviews.title: Best Zipline ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this zipline. It is certified for safety which is very important to me and has accommodated my 4 yr old twins, 6 yr old, and 15 yr old twins (who are big and strong) equally well! It is great for get together and everyone has great times. It has been such a blast and greatly increased the excitement in my backyard. Easy to set up-only 1 hour. Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great zip line! The grand kids love it. Highly recommend purchasing a cable puller and cable clamps! The extra $50 is well worth it. It’s easy to put together, but it is imperative to have a cable puller to get enough needed tension in the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Gena L Zak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: The customer service from this company was amazing. The cable for the line we ordered was slightly short (not by their fault) and they sent us a custom sized cable free of charge! I would definitely recommend having an extra set of hands or two for the installation. The product seems to be well made. We gave this to our kids for Christmas and they have absolutely loved it. I would absolutely recommend ordering from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: It's the most fun item in our backyard
customer_reviews.text: This zip-line is in use on a daily basis. It's the most fun item in our backyard. Assembly was more than one person could handle. The brake really needs a lot of weight for stopping on a grass surface. We love it and it looks to last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is fun for the whole family and my son's friends
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son for his birthday in April and finally got to install it 2 weeks ago. It is fun for the whole family and my son's friends. I am 220lbs and it worked great. We used 2- 5 gallon buckets filled w/ concrete for the break weight. I'm sure we will be enjoying this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun for My Grandsons (or Granddaughters)
customer_reviews.text: This zip line is high quality and was easy to install. I was expecting more problems but all went well. Good instructions and quite frankly not difficult. I had a zipline for my kids 25 years ago. I bought this for my grandsons and installed it at their house. It has been up for about a month and the boys are loving it. The company sent me a longer tie wire for the base tree. Excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Included everything that I needed and was an absolute hit with the grandkids (not so with their mothers but they got over it)!
customer_reviews.author: Florida1

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Had it up for a year now and it is great. Installation was not too bad, but it would be better if it had separate cables to wrap around the tree rather and then use turnbuckles at each end to adjust tension. Overall, absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Book Candi Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, fun for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: We bought the zipline to set up across a dry ravine in our backyard. It's been great fun for both kids and adults. The set-up is quick and straightforward and after a little trial and error on our part, the braking system was the final piece to finish off the kit. It gives our kids a good sense of adventure right out their back door.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great zip line to get started
customer_reviews.text: Straight forward instructions but the cable clamps are a little big. Just need to make sure to tighten all the way. Only been up a week, but it’s a hit! Definitely need a cable puller to get the line tight enough though.
customer_reviews.author: urban farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this item is great. I even lost one of the nuts and they sent me a replacement at no charge. High quality item. The instructions make it as easy as it can be. You will need at least 2 people to install
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: the grandsons love it
customer_reviews.text: well made and everything needed to install was in the box. It was the hit for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Gil Dresback

customer_reviews.title: Endless fun!
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with our purchase! Our children can't get enough of this exciting zip line. It takes up such little space in our backyard, but provides hours of fun each day. The customer service from this company is excellent! We would definitely purchase from them again. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Cervini

customer_reviews.title: the kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very handy and was able to put it up by himself within about 90 minutes. The kids love it. Ages 10 thru 6
customer_reviews.author: Joan W.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, safe and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Great for the kids and the adults! Great buy! Setup was pretty easy and the fun lasted for hours on Christmas Day! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carlee

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Spring is finally here and the kids can have this put up for them. My grandson wants it over the creek...I don't know
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love this - high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It was super easy to set up and it holds grown men (over 200lbs) as well as my kids. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kaden

customer_reviews.title: come flying with the birds
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equipment. easy to set up. Kids love it. Use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Kids have so much fun on this
customer_reviews.text: Kids have so much fun on this, need more than two people to hang it but slides great. I do advise reading the directions carefully because order does matter! Customer service is also great, I needed an extra part and they happily and quickly shipped it! If your in the market for a zip line, this one is great!
customer_reviews.author: molly watson

customer_reviews.title: Great starter zip line kit
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need is included. Instructions are good and easy to understand. Except for how to tension the line. I ended up using a tow strap and a come along to pull the loose end to another tree. I bought 2 more cable saddles to make a loop on the loose end to pull the cable tight. Working good so far. Makes me want to see about a longer run.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, great backyard fun
customer_reviews.text: Put this in instead of a slide on our Granddaughters tree house. Very easy to install, ours goes about 80 feet. Granddaughter loves it! All of the adults have tried it, including her 6’3” Dad. Would recommend to anyone wanting a backyard zipline
customer_reviews.author: Kimberely H.

customer_reviews.title: Comeon send me a warrior 4 jesus to put this kid in best mood ever please
customer_reviews.text: You need a team amd pulley tool ladder deck a whole crew if not come install pleqse i want but am unavle to do it for my kid she really wanted it bad im claremore 😭
customer_reviews.author: Chambly

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Great product, kids enjoy it. Having issues with the stopper at the end, we had to have a big bucket of concrete to slow it down, the stopper which comes with was not that great. The seat could be a little bit bigger. Overall is just fine
customer_reviews.author: A&a

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We received this for my twin's birthday present. We had a zip line party! It was easy to install and works perfectly! We received the item quickly too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This kit is awesome, the cable is large enough to hold adults ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as described. This zip line replaced one we installed years ago. This kit is awesome, the cable is large enough to hold adults as well as kids. Very happy with all the components that came! Well done! Highly recommend, a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: George Whitehill

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, easy set-up (needs 2 people), kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Shellback

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. After spending hours putting up when we ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. After spending hours putting up when we tested it it fell down. So once again we put up and made sure everything was tight and on the 1st ride halfway through it broke free again and that was with a 50lb child. Cable is to thin and clamps are cheap and not big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jim R

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Absoutely as advertized. It took much longer building a wooden stand for kids to go off of than installing the cable. I needed 2/3 fellas to help. Excellent zipline .
customer_reviews.author: vincent labue

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and great customer service. We needed the cord a little longer to work with our tree. They responded immediately and quickly accommodated our needs. Very excited with our new zipline! It’s worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great, quality product
customer_reviews.text: We love this zip line. It had everything we needed in the box to have it up and running. Stretching the line was hard, considering it was me and my husband and I’m pregnant with twins. I would suggest a lot of help or fence stretchers. The fence stretchers allowed us to get it perfect without frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

product_meta.title: CTSC 95 Foot Zip Line Kit with Stainless Steel Spring Brake and Seat
feature_bullets: ✅SAFETY COMES FIRST: Our zip line kits includes a 5.3 Foot Stainless Steel Spring Brake as a braking system, so the zipline does not end at a sudden stop. When it comes to kids' outdoor activities and playground equipment, quality means the world to parents- that’s why we have carefully constructed a product that guarantees complete safety for our little ones. This zip line meets the international quality standards (RoHS & CE) and can easily hold up to 250 lbs!

✅ PERFECT HOLIDAY GIFT IDEA WHICH YOUR KIDS MAY REMEMBER FOR A LIFETIME: Are you looking for a wonderful outdoor activity or a birthday gift that will help you bond with your kids and enjoy unforgettable moments? Look no further. Now you can spend endless hours of backyard fun with your children. Your backyard will instantly become a stunning amusement park, and you will become the neighbourhood’s coolest parent!

✅ OFFER CUSTOMIZED SOLUTIONS: Our zipline kit come with a 7 foot sling cable and 95 foot main cable, the 7 foot sling cable was used to wrapped around the start tree, and the 95 foot main cable should cover the distance between the two trees and the end tree's circumference, if the trees in your backyard are too far apart, CONTACT Us FIRST, simply provide us with the exact distance, and then we will develop a personalized zip line kit for you!

✅ CONVENIENCE FOR YOUR CHILD: Our product is specifically designed for children- non-slippery rubber grips help riders keep a firm hold on the zip line while playing. Remember that using the zip line CORRECTLY IS THE BEST WAY TO KEKP SAFE! kids MUST hold the handle tightly and sit on the seat when using it. Please MAKE SURE the knot under the seat is FIRM enough. It SHOULD BE TESTED FIRST after installed!

✅ 10-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY, ENJOY HAPPY FAMILY MOMENTS FOR YEARS TO COME! – Designed by loving parents, the CTSC durable children’s zip line set is the ideal way to make your kids smile! You will absolutely blow their mind with this fantastic gift idea! However, if for any reason, you are not 100% satisfied with this heavy-duty zip line kit, you can return it within 30 days and we will offer you a full refund. Above all, we want you and your children to be happy!
